message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  This is the best offer you'll get.
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. It's a fair deal.
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but this is still a good deal for both of us.  Inflation is going to hurt us both the longer we wait.
I'm willing to give you a bigger chunk, Alice. Let's make a deal before the money loses more value.
I'm getting impatient, Bob. This is my final offer before I start taking a bigger chunk of the pie.  Let's be reasonable.
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offers, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but you need to meet me halfway.
